issue.title: [CF 1020] Icon can't work until I type /tmw twice
issue.body:
I have created 8 icon to watch Incanter's Flow‘s increase or decrease
top 5 icon are used for watching stack, from 1 to 5.
button 3 icon are used for detecting the stack increaseing and decreasing.

Once I have created the icon, they can work correctly:
icon show red↑ when the stak is increasing, and it will turn to green↓ when the stack is decreasing
but the problem is: when I reload my UI, and I join battle, the red and green icon can't work!
If I type /tmw to show the TMW UI, and type /tmw again to close it, then I join battle, the red and green icon can work again.
If I reload again, that two icon still can't work correctly

So if you import my string, you can see what I wish to see: for the last icon
and then if you reload UI, the bug will come out: green and red icon can't show.

version of TellMeWhen: 7.1.2   download from Curse
